plot: An Italian policeman investigates a series of murders involving people in prominent positions. Left behind at each murder scene is a drawing of a salamander. The policeman begins to suspect...
title: La salamandra roja

cast.role: Prince Baldasar, the Director of Counterintelligence
cast.name: Christopher Lee
